title: Vegetable Cannellini Rice
ingredients: ['1 tbsp fresh basil', '1/2 tsp fresh thyme leaves', '1/4 tsp freshly ground black pepper', '200g white rice', '1 yellow pepper', '1 tin cannellini beans', '1 tsp fresh marjoram leaves', '165g frozen or tinned sweetcorn', '1 tin (400g) Italian tomatoes', '2 tsp olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', 'Â¼ tsp salt', '500ml water']
